Title: Tom and Jerry: The Magic Ring
Writer: William Hanna (characters), Joseph Barbera (characters), Tim Cahill, Julie McNally Cahill
Actors: Jeff Bennett, Frank Welker, Charlie Schlatter, Jim Cummings
Plot: Tom is left in charge of a priceless magical ring by his young wizard master. He is then horrified when the ring gets stuck on Jerry's head, who then runs off into the city.
